website_summaries.verdict: Fans of '90s gaming will relish the unique controllers and the collection of classic titles with this console.
pros: The Super NES Classic is once again a solid upgrade over the original NES
The 16-bit graphics shine on modern TVs
cons: New features like "Rewinding games" are distracting additions

customer_reviews.title: So much nostalgia!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this and play with my sons, who are 7 &4. They were disappointed with the graphics, which made me laugh, because if you grew up in the 90s that's what we were used to!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Gilsdorf

customer_reviews.title: Great system to play most of the SNES Classics!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, as advertised. I just wish there was a way to get to main menu, save/load states, etc without having to get up & hit the reset button. In Super Ghouls & Ghosts that could mean getting up 10 times in a minute save scumming. Just reviewing all the games I had to get up, and hit reset 21 times. The controls need a home menu or a sequence of buttons pressed to reset it.
customer_reviews.author: Kobe

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Really enjoying playing the games with my grandson
customer_reviews.text: I bought this system to have on hand when my grandson stays over. We both really enjoy playing all of the games which came loaded on the system.
customer_reviews.author: Codepop

customer_reviews.title: The quiality of the image is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I can play games I used to play when I was a kid, But the quality of the image is terrible
customer_reviews.author: CARLOS REYNA

customer_reviews.title: Do it, you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: Old school awesomeness! Super easy to hook up. Graphics and games are just as I remembered.
customer_reviews.author: DANIELLE SOSA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My husband was beyond happy to get this for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: kiss9801

customer_reviews.title: love this really fun playing mario again!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used off anazon very exciting to play Mario again after so long has Mario world and yoshis island plus mario cart!! I was really glad to get pretty much a new unit and saved 80 off the price by buying it used!!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan C. HTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Throwback to Childhood
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with the NES and was not disappointed when I set this up. It was easy to setup and has been a lot of fun. I bought it for myself but obviously my kids have been using it most of the time. The only thing I didn't realize is that it doesn't have the ability to insert game into it. That would have been cool for getting the gameboy attachment but hey, doesn't change my love for this!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it's worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bummed I spent 200 on this, my son wanted this system more than anything for Christmas and then got it, played it twice, and hasn't even tried to play it again. Our old school game systems really lack that flash these kids today are used to.
customer_reviews.author: MFoster

customer_reviews.title: doesn't have the best thing about SNES
customer_reviews.text: So the best thing about SNES was the fun you have while playing couch CO-OP. There is only few games you can play multiplayer and only 3 are good. All else is good, buttons work on time when you hit them, graphics almost as good as original. I just wish had more multiplayer games
customer_reviews.author: ronny

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Its too expensive and it seems as its not worth it im looking forward to returning it and getting my money back and purchasing the pokemon edition which has more games and its cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Franco

customer_reviews.title: Best! Brings me back
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 2 boys who are used to the newer games of their generation but when I plugged this baby in they’ve been playing for nearly 6 hours straight, talk about a classic and always puts a smile on my face so happy I got this
customer_reviews.author: Brittney(AZ Native)

customer_reviews.title: Must buy! 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Was able to save my progress after looking up manual on Nintendo's website to see how. Reminds me of my childhood. Made me so happy I almost cried.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey C.

customer_reviews.title: Children can figure it out!!
customer_reviews.text: The Nintendo super was bought got our grandkids, ages 8, 6, 5. They have spent hours playing and discovering levels in all the games we didn’t know existed! Be prepared to lose your children/grandchildren to these games! 🙁
customer_reviews.author: elva

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: Oh yeah! Donkey Kong! This brings back a lot of awesome memories spending endless hours playing Super Nintendo. My husband and I are in our late 40's and having a blast once again. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Conejo

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: We had high hopes for this, SNES was a staple in the house when we were kiddos. But honestly, this product has been terrible since about a month or so after using it. It glitches out, restarts on its own and the controllers do not work well either. Get a switch instead, we wish we would have!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlea

customer_reviews.title: This is best  Nintendo Super package
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this for his Christmas surprise. It includes everything needed to play and not have to buy other stuff
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Old school
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this!! Has a few of the old school games that my wife and I loved and still love to play. The only thing we don't like about it is you have to get up and reset the system if you want to play a different game on the system. Shipped and arrived quickly though and is as described. 4 stars cause of the game makers.
customer_reviews.author: Silver6879

customer_reviews.title: If it’s a gift - BEWARE OF PACKING
customer_reviews.text: Was SUPER disappointed that this came with a label slapped on the actual box as it was supposed to be a gift (Only reason it’s not 5 stars) . However, we are booting it up tonight to get ‘lit’ with Mario kart and diet Mtn Dew.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made product
customer_reviews.text: Take a trip down memory lane!!! This was awesome to play with the family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia at its finest!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun and just like the originals from way back when. Smooth play, awesome graphics and great games that are just as fun today as they were 25 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Holman Family

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game selection, good performance, nice controllers. It took a bit to find the video mode that worked best for us (emulation) but after that it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Le Blee

customer_reviews.title: Was a perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: We love I got it for my mom for Christmas and she loves it that she can play Mario again
customer_reviews.author: melissa kessler

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Great system! My son loves it! Easy to set up and easy to plug into TV set and play. It comes with a ton of old school games that my son loves to play.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Crow

customer_reviews.title: Super cool!
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesomely nostalgic. Played it for hours when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for his birthday. He loves it. We haven't had any problems with it what so ever! Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: LaCresha Clough

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game system! All the great classics! Can’t stop playing it!!
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter loves playing all the games from my childhood. I am so glad we bought this! All the games i used to love to play with my dad I can play with her now!
customer_reviews.author: Krystle Wimberly

customer_reviews.title: Stock games + Memory
customer_reviews.text: Performed and adapted (key word: zombies are my neighbors) exactly as expected. Bought on impulse, but still glad to have the option
customer_reviews.author: Jake Paxton

customer_reviews.title: Get one while you still can
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad for Christmas because it has the type of games he remembers playing the most. He loved it! The delivery was a few days late
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Extension cord
customer_reviews.text: The cord extensions are great, except they glitch and it makes the control freeze for about 10-20 seconds every couple mintues.
customer_reviews.author: kala

customer_reviews.title: Great nostalgia playing games from my childhood
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy playing the games I grew up playing when I was a kid. Great value for the money. I will definitely recommend this to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Adam N.

customer_reviews.title: Classic!
customer_reviews.text: Love our Nintendo SNES. It was alot smaller than I expected but still a great product to share with the younger generation.
customer_reviews.author: April Saucedo

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Having so much fun playing my favorite old games! The hdmi cord really gives my games a entirely different experience!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Janes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the application
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for younger siblings to be able to “ play along” its their older brother with some more dimple games
customer_reviews.author: brian lesch

customer_reviews.title: Unreal
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come in Snes box, only a cardboard box with a sticker of the Snes box and products inside.
customer_reviews.author: TheWolfIsRain

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Was great for about 2 days. 1 controller already stopped working. Was hoping for a better product for how much I paid
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo
customer_reviews.text: I love everything Accept how you have to use your PC to program other games.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle luman

customer_reviews.title: Great fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her game console and the shipping and ordering were great.Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: albert lawson

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: It's just like the old days..... well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Steven lee

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son, we both have so much fun
customer_reviews.author: Ubaldo q.

customer_reviews.title: A system for the ages
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the original SNES, just smaller. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Noah Mazzarese

product_meta.title: Nintendo Super Entertainment System SNES Classic Edition with Two 6-ft. Extension Cable
product_meta.description: BRAND NEW, but does not include extension cables!
feature_bullets: Nintendo Super Entertainment System SNES Classic Edition with Two 6-ft. Extension Cable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars278 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
